path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Clinical Lvn Training/Assignments/Dosage Calculation Assignment #2.docx
text: Name __Paul Briery___________ Dosage Calculations Assignment #2 *Terms must be spelled correctly to receive credit. 1)	What do the following abbreviations stand for? A)	tid __Three times a day__		B) 	tsp __teaspoon___________ *Remember to round to the nearest tenth, round IV problems to the nearest whole number and label all your final answers. 2)	Convert the following temperatures: A)	100째 F = __37.77_____ 째C	B)	36째C = _96.8_________ 째F 3)	A health care provider orders phenobarbital 15 mg po q 12 h. How many milliliters will the nurse administer per dose? __3_____________________ 4)	The health care provider has ordered Tegretol 0.2 g po TID for a client with epilepsy. The nurse has Tegretol 100 mg tablets on hand. How many tablets will the nurse administer? _____2____________________ 5)	A health care provider orders Zantac 150 mg po BID for a client with esophagitis. How many milliliters will the nurse administer per dose? _____6_____________ 6)	A health care provider orders a client Wellbutrin 150 mg po daily for 3 days for smoking cessation. The nurse has Wellbutrin 75 mg tablets on hand. How many tablets will the nurse administer per dose? ___2____________________ 7)	Order: NS 1500 mL to infuse over 6.5 hours. Drop factor = 60 gtt/mL. How many mL/h? ___231______________________ How many gtt/min? ___231____231/60*60________________ 8)	The health care provider orders 250 mL of D5W to infuse over 20 minutes. Drop factor = 15 gtt/mL. How many mL/h? ___750_____250*3______________ How many gtt/min? __188____750/60*15_________ 9)	A client with a UTI is ordered amikacin 250 mg IVPB q8h to infuse over 1 hour. The amikacin is dissolved in 200 mL of D5W. The drop factor is 20 gtt/mL. How many mL/h? __200_________________________ How many gtt/min? __67__200/60*20_______________ 10)	A client with an elevated blood urea nitrogen and low blood pressure is ordered 1000 mL of 0.9% NS to be infused over 8 hours. The drop factor is 10 gtt/mL. How many mL/h? ____125____________________ How many gtt/min? ___20______125/60*10________
